Uses of Class
com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.MultiBoardRequest

  • Packages that use MultiBoardRequest 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility
    The package urbanmobility provides classes, callbacks, and enumerations that can be used to enable functionality related to public transit such as search for nearby transit stations and requests for departure boards.

    • Uses of MultiBoardRequest in com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility

      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility that return MultiBoardRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MultiBoardRequest RequestManager.createMultiBoardRequest(GeoCoordinate stationCoordinate, RequestManager.ResponseListener<MultiBoardResult> listener)
      Creates an instance of MultiBoardRequest.
      MultiBoardRequest MultiBoardRequest.setDepartureTime(java.util.Date time)
      Sets the time point after which departures should be returned.
      MultiBoardRequest MultiBoardRequest.setMaxDeparturesPerStation(int maxDepartures)
      Sets the maximum number of departures to be returned per station.
      MultiBoardRequest MultiBoardRequest.setRadius(int radius)
      Sets radius in meters that defines the area of the search.
      MultiBoardRequest MultiBoardRequest.setRequestRealTimeInfoEnabled(boolean realTimeInfo)
      Set if RealTimeInfo for found departures should be included in the response.
      MultiBoardRequest MultiBoardRequest.setStationIds(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> stationIds)
      Sets the station IDs for which departures will be returned.
